section.title: Eclipse
section.para: For JSP development you need the Eclipse WTP and an installed Tomcat. See Installation of Eclipse WTP and Tomcat .

section.title: JSF library
section.para: A JSF library is required. We will later use Eclipse to download and install the Apache MyFaces JSF implementation during project creation.

section.title: JSLT library
section.para: Download the JSLT library from https://jstl.dev.java.net/ .
